commits.subject: ci: fix build by adding content write permissions
commits.message: ci: fix build by adding content write permissions

commits.subject: test(color-scheme): improve integration test by removing motion
commits.message: test(color-scheme): improve integration test by removing motion

commits.subject: test: fix root component test, missing new release comp
commits.message: test: fix root component test, missing new release comp

commits.subject: docs(release): minor correction about last release info
commits.message: docs(release): minor correction about last release info

commits.subject: feat(release): add release info in hidden <pre> block
commits.message: feat(release): add release info in hidden <pre> block

commits.subject: build(semantic-release): export release info to display in app
commits.message: build(semantic-release): export release info to display in app

commits.subject: refactor: scripts to use top level await, yay!
commits.message: refactor: scripts to use top level await, yay!

commits.subject: refactor: scripts to use ESM
commits.body:
use ".mts" extension (setting "type": "module" breaks Angular prerender)
specify extension when importing in scripts
move utils into "src" so it's included as part of tsconfig.json
update tsconfig.json to use nodenext for ESM enablement
update tsconfig.json to output to "dist" for debug js compilation
update tsconfig.json to tell ts-node to enable ESM
update utils to use ESM (isMain, __dirname subst)
update import of metadata.js to use CommonJs compatibility
commits.message:
refactor: scripts to use ESM

use ".mts" extension (setting "type": "module" breaks Angular prerender)
specify extension when importing in scripts
move utils into "src" so it's included as part of tsconfig.json
update tsconfig.json to use nodenext for ESM enablement
update tsconfig.json to output to "dist" for debug js compilation
update tsconfig.json to tell ts-node to enable ESM
update utils to use ESM (isMain, __dirname subst)
update import of metadata.js to use CommonJs compatibility
